body:
kinda agree with @xyst16..
its been 6 freaking years.. same as the last chapter of the og manga.. :(
guess we will never see an end to this...
i think that just like the manga we never going to see a ending to this
Bless this shit I want part 7😇🥰
i want part 7 and a threesome
part 7 when?
Part 7 plsssssss threesome, Fei-sensei!!!!!
I reallllly want to ship them😭♥️♥️
War happened here
best girl in the anime
This niggas typing a mf mla format essay in nhentai
Need a part 7 where he plows both of them & might as well add the nurse😏
@shinei mylon @truthteller That scene from last chapter was simply from Takashi’s dream no?
@RedHawk01 guess we'll only know if there's another one of these.

@Shen-San but if it’s not a dream I hope they can do a threesome . Or stuff like that . I do think she want more Takeshita than any other people . Wait Takeshi to take his revenge on that girl to lay a finger on Saeko .
@Shen-San Takeshi wake up as it seem it was a dream .

Still wasn't a fan of the ntr, but hey - porn is porn. I love the art style and the story up until the yuri chapter, still got mixed feelings about that. Then again this isn't canon so who cares. Also, @RedHawk01 was that chapter really a dream?
Better to end up as an harem .

These comments went crazy, calm down . First it was just a dream then she’s that horny because she always have sex with him after a battle so instead of doing it with a ramdam guy she do it with a girl even if it’s cheating in a sense I rather prefer that than being raped by a random come from nowhere .
4 years have passed we still have no part 7 brother I dont think I can go on any further...
https://nhentai.net/g/105235/parte 5

@metroid and you are a beta cuck

@Shinsei Mylon you say you are not in favor of ntr and you say saeko wuldnt allow a man to touch her yet you say ''a woman is a different story'' which proves the fact that you are a hypocritical liar with a massive double standard, every time i read your comment it just amazes me how you can say that a woman isn't cheating, and while it's good that you apologize and i understood that it was your opinion, the problem with your ''no need to hate'' comment is that you started off like you are against ntr and cheating yet instantly contradict yoursel by forgiving this absolute bullshit of a doujin, and i call it out because i despise hypocrites and double standards and the alike, and that is why i get ''triggered'' because i'm not gonna compromise on my moral beliefs for any reason, also not to mention ofcourse i get this passionate because i am someone who gets invested in stories beacuse otherwise they have no meaning, and if i find a good story and the
still waiting for part 7
The last chapter was a dream, you retards. Same thing happened in chapter 2.
While people are arguing down below, I'm just here waiting for the part 7 to be released
jackir is a vanillafag bitch with a severe case of butthurt. Fact, yep. :)
Look at you faggots, instead of jerking off you're arguing like soyboys in a fucking hentai site. faggots.

To be fair, Saeko (in this doujin) gets uncontrollably horny after fights and got conditioned to have sex with Takashi afterwards. Her cheating on Takeshi last chapter due to him being severely wounded wasn’t unexpected. She still a ho tho

@Shinsei Mylon i'm sorry but how fucking stupid are you? there are no exceptions in complete devotion, if it requires them to come to terms with what happened and make up, she's CLEARLY not devoted, and that ridiculous notion of ''a woman is a different story entirely'' how? because she can't be impregnated? i'm sorry but this isn't some fairy world where sex means nothing just cuz it's with a woman, that's still very much fucking cheating and NTR and completely betraying takashi.

also what the actual fuck? you're clearly fucking stupid and disgusting since you are in FAVOR of NTR shit yet tell me to get it out of here, even when the only thing i referenced was IN THE STORY BY THE AUTHOR, and you then defend it like it wasn't NTR, which it totally was, then you just pretend like it didnt happen!?!? I am possibly the single biggest NTR, swinging, cheating despiser out there, and you fucking dare tell me to get MY ntr shit outta here? get the fuck out you fucking filthy ntr lover

Complete devotion is complete devotion there is no sub genre because you give your all to that person, think of Christianity god calls for your full devotion so if you decided to be Muslim for a year it's not full devotion because for that year you believed and worshipped another God (sorry for Bible bashing)
@jackir yeah, I kinda agree with you. That chapter was a bit garbage story wise. If fei wanted a yuri scene, he could've just used shizuka.

@thangio AHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA too bad in the one before this https://nhentai.net/g/105235/ saeko just straight up cheats on him with the other girl with a garbage excuse like ''we're borth girls so it's not really cheating'' so all that ''complete devotion'' is bullcrap and she's just a cheating slut, dosen't even try to reconcile after dosen't feel the least bit sorry, so yes takashi is devoted but she's a loose cheating slut, legit instant okay with cheating, so this series is complete trash sorry to ruin your day, since she will be okay with getting gangraped and probably him dying aswell
the best ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
HOLY FUCKING FUCK
I fucking love Fei
This series is wonderful. I love vanilla love story with complete devotion to each other like this.
where's KISS OF THE DEAD 7?
No that's Fucking gay.
Anyone know if there is a physical copy of this and if so where can I buy one at? Gotta support the creator!
For such a long wait, this chapter was underwhelming.
